body:
Maybe this already exists but I cannot find something.

If I have multiple variants of the same library installed but there is only an env module for only one

- then I would like to have no conflicts when calling `spack load <library>`
- load the variant that has the env module

Libraries without env modules are installed as make deps only anyways.
And I would like to be able loading libs by their name instead of every time using the hash just because there is another variant installed as a make dep.
title: `spack load`: Don't conflict if only one env module exists
